name: Warp (itch) (deathmtn)
description:
MOBILE PLAYERS: It has some issue with the Itch.io outer frame. You can play on mobile here.

(Sorry, sometimes the player character won't show up in the initial view. In those cases, drag the view around to find it, or just reload the page!)

This is what I worked on for 7DRL 2018. It ended up being more of gameplay demo than a game demo. The idea is that eventually, you'll be able to hop to different grids. Currently, you can only stay on one grid. You (and your enemies) will be able to affect the various grids via gravity warping (like the kind you see on some of the grids when you load) and other effects.
